<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="es">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>CLOSURES</title>
</head>
<body>
    
    <script>(function () {
  let color = "green";

  function printColor() {
    console.log(color);
  }

  printColor();
})(); // Funciones que retornan otras funciones


function makeColorPrinter(color) {
  let colorMessage = color;
  return function colorPrinter() {
    console.log(`The color is ${colorMessage}`);
  };
}

const greenColorPrinter = makeColorPrinter("GREEN");
greenColorPrinter(); // Creando variables privadas con closures

function makeCounter(n) {
  let count = n;
  return {
    increase: () => {
      count += 1;
    },
    decrease: () => {
      count -= 1;
    },
    getCount: () => {
      return count;
    }
  };
}

const counter = makeCounter(7);
console.log(counter.count);
console.log(counter.getCount());
counter.increase();
counter.increase();
console.log(counter.getCount());
counter.decrease();
console.log(counter.getCount());</script>
</body>
</html>
